PACKAGE.NAME: Genso Suikoden II Bug Fix Patch

PATCH.name: Badeaux Appears
PATCH.description: Badeaux will appear in the castle grounds near the pond behind the library.

PATCH.name: Castle Armory Fix
PATCH.description: Prevents the Castle Armory from selling items when the player has insufficient potch.

PATCH.name: Castle Farm Fix
PATCH.description: Fixes the Castle Farm module so the player can hand in multiple seeds or animals at one time.

PATCH.name: Chaco Joins At Level 1
PATCH.description: Adds a missing Set Level command to Chaco's recruit script.

PATCH.name: Circlet Name Correction
PATCH.description: Changes "circuret" to "circlet"

PATCH.name: Collectibles Fix
PATCH.description: Repairs errors in the after-battle module that can prevent Recipes, Window Sets and Sound Sets from dropping.

PATCH.name: Forgiver Sign Fix
PATCH.description: Fix display. Forgiver Sign does zero damage, but a huge value is displayed.

PATCH.name: Godspeed Rune Name Correction
PATCH.description: Changes "True Holy" to "Godspeed"

PATCH.name: Gozz Rune renamed Minotaur Rune
PATCH.description: Changes "Gozz" to "Minotaur"

PATCH.name: Gozz Rune renamed Gozu Rune
PATCH.description: Changes "Gozz" to "Gozu"

PATCH.name: GS1 Load - Names Fix
PATCH.description: Fixes the transfer of the hero and castle names from the original Genso Suikoden.

PATCH.name: Inns Fix
PATCH.description: Prevent the Inn from healing the party for free.

PATCH.name: Join At 99 Fix
PATCH.description: Prevents recruits from joining at 99 in error.

PATCH.name: Kindness Rune Fix (No Penalty)
PATCH.description: When a character's invisible Kindness Rating goes below zero, the Rune gives no bonus to attack instead of maxing it out.

PATCH.name: Kindness Rune Fix (Penalty)
PATCH.description: When a character's invisible Kindness Rating goes below zero, the Rune gives a penalty to attack instead of maxing it out.

PATCH.name: Knife-thrower Fix
PATCH.description: Adds a custom routine for the Knife-throwing event in Ryube that keeps HP from being zeroed.

PATCH.name: Lamb Fix (Unicorn Woods)
PATCH.description: Separates the acquired flag for the lamb from the flag for the first chest (can now get both).

PATCH.name: Luca Battle Party-change Fix
PATCH.description: The party is emptied but not reformed prior to fighting Luca, allowing the hero to be alone in the back row and effectively invincible. Fix forces the party to reform.

PATCH.name: Matilda Gate Fix
PATCH.description: Makes the Matilda Gate immovable.

PATCH.name: Music Patches
PATCH.description: Fixes the disc information for several musical tracks. They now play properly.

PATCH.name: Rune Unite Fix
PATCH.description: Repairs a bug that could allow a single character to participate in multiple Rune Unite spells.

PATCH.name: Scroll Shop Display Fix
PATCH.description: Stops the Scroll Shop from displaying the actual names of unidentified items.

PATCH.name: Tenzan Pass Enemies Fix
PATCH.description: Translates the names of the enemies in Tenzan pass, and adds the formations that contain the Chimera-type monster to the encounter table.

PATCH.name: Trade Gossip Translation
PATCH.description: Translates the text of the trade gossip, which otherwise appears as a garbage in-game.
